Class Shell.Sync

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.topjohnwu.superuser.Shell.Sync
  • Enclosing class:
    Shell

    public static final class Shell.Sync
extends Object
    High level API for synchronous operations

    • Method Summary

      static ArrayList<String> loadScript(InputStream in)
      Equivalent to loadScript(new ArrayList<String>(), in) with the new ArrayList returned after the script finish running.

    • Method Detail

      • loadScript

        public static ArrayList<String> loadScript(InputStream in)
        Equivalent to loadScript(new ArrayList<String>(), in) with the new ArrayList returned after the script finish running.
        Returns:
        the result of the script loaded from the InputStream.

      • loadScript

        public static void loadScript(List<String> output,
                              InputStream in)
        Equivalent to 
        loadScript(output, REDIRECT_STDERR ? output : null, in).
        Parameters:
        output - if Shell.FLAG_REDIRECT_STDERR is set, STDERR outputs will also be stored here.

      • loadScript

        public static void loadScript(List<String> output,
                              List<String> error,
                              InputStream in)
        Get a shell from Shell.getShell() and call Shell.loadInputStream(List, List, InputStream).
        See Also:
        Shell.loadInputStream(List, List, InputStream)

      • sh

        public static void sh(List<String> output,
                      List<String> error,
                      String... commands)
        Get a shell from Shell.getShell() and call Shell.run(List, List, String...).
        See Also:
        Shell.run(List, List, String...)

      • sh

        public static void sh(List<String> output,
                      String... commands)
        Equivalent to 
        sh(output, REDIRECT_STDERR ? output : null, commands).
        Parameters:
        output - if Shell.FLAG_REDIRECT_STDERR is set, STDERR outputs will also be stored here.

      • sh

        public static ArrayList<String> sh(String... commands)
        Equivalent to sh(new ArrayList<String>(), commands) with the new ArrayList returned when all commands are done.
        Returns:
        the result of the commands.

      • su

        public static void su(List<String> output,
                      List<String> error,
                      String... commands)
        Equivalent to sh(List, List, String...) with root access check before running.

      • su

        public static void su(List<String> output,
                      String... commands)
        Equivalent to sh(List, String...) with root access check before running.

      • su

        public static ArrayList<String> su(String... commands)
        Equivalent to sh(String...) with root access check before running.
